Header: President meets Canadian HC and a Chinese Special representative
Content: David McKinnon, High Commissioner of Canada to Sri Lanka met President Gotabhaya Rajapaksa today. Their meeting took place at the Presidentâ€™s office. The Canadian High Commissioner who engaged in a cordial discussion with the President extended his greetings to the President on behalf of the Canadian Government. Meanwhile, Wu Jiang-hao, who is also a Special Representative of the State of China and Director-General of the Asian Region of the Ministry of Foreign Affairs of China, calledon President Gotabhaya Rajapaksa. Wu Jiang-hao was also a former Chinese Ambassador to Sri Lanka.
